transportAdvice: Cleveland has a public transit system with buses and a light rail line connecting downtown to the airport and some neighborhoods, though coverage of tourist areas is uneven and a car is often more practical. Taxis and rideshares are generally available downtown, and the compact downtown core and areas like University Circle are walkable.

weather.description: Cold and often grey with frequent snow and lake-effect flurries from Lake Erie.
Still cold and wintry with continued risk of snow and overcast skies.
Early spring brings variable weather with a mix of rain, snow, and occasional mild days.
Spring arrives with warming temperatures but frequent rain showers and unpredictable conditions.
Pleasant and green with mild temperatures and a good mix of sun and showers.
Warm and humid with long days, occasional thunderstorms, and comfortable evenings.
The warmest month, hot and humid with occasional afternoon thunderstorms.
Still warm and humid, similar to July, with a gradual easing toward late summer.
Comfortable early fall with cooling temperatures and pleasant sunny stretches.
Crisp autumn weather with colorful foliage and increasing cloud cover toward month's end.
Cold and frequently overcast with rain and the first chances of early snow.
Cold and wintry with snow likely and the characteristic grey skies of a Lake Erie winter.
